entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.8°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
